data.comment: The big names in today's match at Liberty Stadium have now been confirmed.
The first-half is under way at Liberty Stadium - Swansea kick-off to start the match.
In the minute 10, Korey Smith is booked for the home team.
Bournemouth's Dominic Solanke has been booked in Swansea.
The first-half has come to a close in Swansea.
In the minute 46, Bournemouth kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Diego Rico Salguero for Bournemouth has been booked by Peter Bankes and receives a first yellow card.
Philip Billing (Bournemouth) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 75, Swansea make their first substitution with Viktor Gyokeres replacing Jamal Lowe.
Steve Cooper is making the team's second substitution at Liberty Stadium with Kasey Palmer replacing Yan Dhanda.
Sam Surridge is on a sub for David Brooks for Bournemouth.
In the minute 85, Jason Tindall (Bournemouth) is making a second substitution, with Jefferson Lerma replacing Philip Billing.
The match is over. Final score 0-0.
